verses.name: Proverbs 7:8
verses.text: Passing through the street near her corner; and he went the way to her house,

verses.name: Proverbs 7:9
verses.text: In the twilight, in the evening, in the black and dark night:

verses.name: Proverbs 7:10
verses.text: And, behold, there met him a woman with the attire of an harlot, and subtil of heart.

verses.name: Proverbs 7:11
verses.text: (She is loud and stubborn; her feet abide not in her house:

verses.name: Proverbs 7:12
verses.text: Now is she without, now in the streets, and lieth in wait at every corner.)

verses.name: Proverbs 7:13
verses.text: So she caught him, and kissed him, and with an impudent face said unto him,

verses.name: Proverbs 7:14
verses.text: I have peace offerings with me; this day have I payed my vows.
